name: Timeline
desc: An object that specifies a date for WidgetKit to update a widget’s view.

items.name: init(entries: [EntryType], policy: TimelineReloadPolicy)
items.desc: Creates a timeline for when you want WidgetKit to update a widget’s view.

items.name: struct TimelineReloadPolicy
items.desc: A type that indicates the earliest date WidgetKit requests a new timeline from the widget’s provider.
